about_the_game:
Heroes of Loot : Gauntlet of Power is a fast paced, randomly generated action RPG shooter with dungeon crawling and Rogue-like elements. As you hold the Gauntlet of Power you gain the ability to mount automated weapons in eight directions to protect and mow down the many dangers lurking in the dungeons. Descent into the dungeon finding mysteries, collecting loot, and unlocking a host of weapons for your Gauntlet of Power!

About the DEMO


The game is still VERY much in development, and that is reflected in the demo. I will push new demo version every few months so if you don't like the demo right now, or run into many bugs or problems, check back in a few weeks or months from now! If you DO enjoy the demo but you have great ideas or want to give me some feedback or encouragement, then come visit the Discord, mail me, or leave a comment on my weekly Youtube videos!
